VigrahaRakṣitā – भारत की आपदा सुरक्षा प्रहरी

Guardian of India during Disasters

{/* Brief about disaster preparedness */}

Importance of Disaster Preparedness in India

India faces frequent natural disasters such as floods, earthquakes, and cyclones. Being prepared can save lives and reduce damage. VigrahaRakṣitā aims to provide timely information and resources to help communities stay safe and resilient.
